Body:
example_directory_path = os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__)
    ) + '/example_projects'
original_stdout = sys.stdout
sys.stdout = output = StringIO()
run_all(example_directory_path, 'example_tests')
sys.stdout = original_stdout
return Expect(output.getvalue()).to_include('test_fizz', 'test_buzz',
    'test_fizzbuzz', 'test_number', 'test_fail', 'test_error',
    'test_no_return', 'Passed: 4, Failed: 3')
